channel.title: Help with moparscape 508
channel.description:
Okay, I could get up to the menu screen but when I try to login it always says "No response from server. please try a different world". :(
and 2nd, is there a server that is up that has :pnpc ? :/ (508-575)

item.title: Help with moparscape 508
item.dc:creator: @Rad02 Rad02
item.description:
@Rad02 wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:2, topic:541824”]Server related questions should be in the correct section. Try server help next time.

Anyhow, are you trying to play on moparisthebest.com or a downloaded source? To me it sounds like the first option, so I’m going to recommend checking out the Server status page. Find a server that interests you, click it, and find out more about it. You may need to download their game client to play though.

Secondly, I’d imagine no public server has commands enabled for pnpc. You could set up your own server to do that though.

Happy moparscapeing ![/quote]

Yeah, I’m sorry! I will ask there next time.

and yeah, it was the first option. I wanted to play the moparscape 508 as there I could use PNPC.
but it always comes No response from server.

Ah, thanks. Yep, I wanted to make my own… but I can’t find a easy way to do it. :c I’m no expert.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with moparscape 508
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Server related questions should be in the correct section. Try server help next time.

Anyhow, are you trying to play on moparisthebest.com or a downloaded source? To me it sounds like the first option, so I’m going to recommend checking out the Server status page. Find a server that interests you, click it, and find out more about it. You may need to download their game client to play though.

Secondly, I’d imagine no public server has commands enabled for pnpc. You could set up your own server to do that though.

Happy moparscapeing !
